items.simpleContent: {"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231224/2023122409325079677430.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231224/2023122409325076267153.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第四十七天\n前两天调节了起笔，今天调了行笔和身体的相对未知，让笔在中线行走，感觉还不错","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":960,"height":531,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231223/2023122310073589532598.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2165,"height":4440,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231223/2023122310073637589623.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第四十六天\n冬至闭关，少些几条","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":837,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231221/2023122110042466571056.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231221/2023122110042472536271.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第四十五天\n今天写得慢，写得少，感觉逐渐回来了，尤其是起笔","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231220/2023122010131374117793.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231220/2023122010131377182.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖，第四十四天\n起笔稍微好一点了，写到最后容易歪，需要停顿把身体往外挪，哈哈","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231218/202312180857022377847.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231218/2023121808570227963007.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第四十三天\n不要急于求成，写好线条不是最终的目标，写本身就是目标。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231217/2023121705590257029793.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231217/2023121705590259082455.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖四十二\n竖和横的起笔有待加强，继续加练，慢一点。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":671,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231216/2023121605030747325342.jpg","idx":0},{"width":631,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231216/2023121605030747035048.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第41天\n起笔真的很重要啊，影响整条线的质感。\n写竖的时候要一直调整方向，稍不注意就偏了，老师这样对吗？","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":659,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231213/2023121301255903154257.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231213/2023121301255911876819.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第40天\n前几天一直没有练习横线，今天再写发现退步了。另外写字的时候尽量不要干其他事，否则真的很难写好啊。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":557,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231212/2023121203532684833909.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第四十天\n今天最后一根写得还行，其他的都有毛边，显得虚浮，其主要原因在于起笔和行笔时笔没有按到位，行笔时笔和纸面的角度有问题，写到靠近身体的时候身体没有调整。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121111413621658943.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231211/2023121111413619870826.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三十九天\n第一张是先写的，第二张是后写的，明显第二张好一点，主要原因还在起笔铺豪不够大胆，不敢下压，急忙就行笔导致的，另外就是笔拉近身体后不够放松，低头看的原因。\n第二张调整了以上问题，还调整了站姿，双腿微曲，好像站桩的姿势。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231210/2023121010221975369110.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三十八天\n个别起笔有问题，有些行笔的开头有些快，但整体的笔直性没啥问题","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":512,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231209/2023120909571330888919.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三十八天\n把身体姿势调整好，竖写的越来越有质感了，也越来越直了，有类似问题的同学也可以做个参考。\n写得时候两脚大概与肩同宽，双眼目视前方，头略有前倾，不要扭转腰部，大臂带动肩关节，小臂和手基本不动，有点做扩胸运动的感觉。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231208/2023120809062642660546.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三十七天
个别起笔和收笔还欠妥，但把身体姿势调整好，竖写的越来越有质感了，也越来越直了，有类似问题的同学也可以做个参考。
写得时候两脚大概与肩同宽，双眼目视前方，头略有前倾，不要扭转腰部，大臂带动肩关节，小臂和手基本不动，有点做扩胸运动的感觉。
","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231207/2023120709553769965108.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231207/2023120709553773127901.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三十六天
分享不传之密
要想线条直，身体不要歪，
要想起笔顺，铺豪慢大胆
要想有质感，提按要过关
要想收笔圆，讲究时机慢。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":955,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231206/2023120612281255477447.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231206/2023120612281259343437.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第35天\n调整站姿，起笔大胆铺豪，缓慢行笔，继续进步。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":960,"height":547,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120504512994317776.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231205/2023120504512989795382.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三十四天\n竖线写的时候太容易偏了，同学们有没有什么建议","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231204/202312041204415845870.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231204/2023120412044167749966.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第33天\n今天写的有进步，其实没有其他变化，就是起行收都慢一点而已。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":633,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231203/2023120312200110584945.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三十二天\n好几天没练横，起笔都有些生疏，竖的起笔也不对，也许是内心不够安定导致的吧","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1576,"height":3790,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231202/2023120205304123649986.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231202/2023120205304092571028.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三十一天\n最近进步比较慢，反思了一下，主要是单纯的写但思考和调整不够。前几天调整了起笔，但还是不够熟练，成功率不够，行笔的时候笔豪容易偏。是时候重温一下老师的视频了，反思对照修改！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231201/2023120108594409481773.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231201/2023120108594413174519.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三十天\n今天状态不好，起笔还是有点问题","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231130/2023113004051187999370.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第二十九天\n\n调整起笔，逐渐找到感觉。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":829,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231129/2023112909343803099918.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第二十八天\n调整了起笔，找到点诀窍，之前起笔“按提按”的三步骤中提的太多，调整之后还不错","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231128/2023112804382142912865.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231128/2023112804382135954379.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖二十八天\n竖线的起笔有待加强，起笔不行一根线都不行。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231126/2023112607531804368835.jpg","idx":0},{"width":960,"height":637,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231126/2023112607531805844098.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖，第二十七天\n状态不太好，继续努力，坚持练习","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":664,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231123/2023112309024214610761.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖26\n左竖右横，仍然有待提高，慢下来，静下来，更规律的生活。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":960,"height":620,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231121/2023112106132585292806.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231121/2023112106132592632273.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第二十六天\n第一条横完美的不可思议，竖仍需要慢下来找感觉","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":960,"height":550,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231120/202311200930393472855.jpg","idx":0},{"width":560,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231120/2023112009303941245297.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖，第二十五天\n今天也要继续加油啊","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":726,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231118/2023111805170933976998.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":768,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231118/202311180517093594282.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第二十四天\n虽然停了几天，但写竖的感觉越来越好，和横难以分辨","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":715,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231117/2023111706294781279865.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第二十三天\n耽搁了一阵子，今天开始继续练习，竖线功夫还在。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231105/202311050933472645364.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第二十二天\n最后一根找到了和写横一样的感觉，不过笔拉近身体后又没那么强烈了，继续加油吧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231104/2023110404480685577446.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1080,"height":1920,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231104/2023110404491607925255.gif","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231104/2023110404480694178281.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第二十一天\n竖还不熟练，写得快了质量就下降了。再分享一个壁纸\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":783,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231103/2023110306063133143124.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1080,"height":1920,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231103/2023110306063956073171.gif","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":768,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231103/202311030606313726054.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第二十天\n今天写得慢，感觉不错。分享一些好看的壁纸。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":748,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231102/2023110202592039662994.jpg","idx":0},{"width":628,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231102/2023110202592048911888.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第19天\n写得不错，继续加油。\n世间唯有名言，没有实义","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":752,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231101/2023110103374906948182.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231101/2023110103374915260020.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第十八天\n写得一般，下次再慢点。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":768,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231031/2023103105442566845056.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231031/2023103105442567954821.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第十七天\n调整了手腕和握笔姿势，果然又有大的进步。😄","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":683,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231030/2023103006400219232543.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231030/2023103006400213055842.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第十六天\n今天竖有些歪，不过又有新的进步。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":823,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231029/2023102905045291974289.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231029/2023102905045291571545.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第十五天\n进步挺大的，今早上还羡慕兔斯基的竖，没想到今天自己写得也不错。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":823,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/2023102804004790844140.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231028/2023102804004796797340.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第十四天\n千江有水千江月，万里无云万里空。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":960,"height":618,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231027/2023102709500538139706.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231027/2023102709500546569338.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第十三天\n似乎有进步，哈哈哈哈哈","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231026/2023102604212984629169.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231026/2023102604212991517064.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第十二天\n除了第一和第六天，其他写得还行，不过个别起笔还不好。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231025/2023102508104079241315.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231025/2023102508104086824998.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第十一天\n起笔格外注意了，也写得相对慢了，感觉竖的质量不错。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231024/2023102406460966022589.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231024/2023102406460965715713.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第10天\n最近起笔的节奏好像不太对，不够圆润，明天着重纠正。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":960,"height":592,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231023/2023102309184576385981.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231023/2023102309184584356531.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第九天\n慢下来跟随呼吸，写的感觉好多了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231022/2023102208115221741055.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":940,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231022/2023102208115222354910.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第八天\n写得有些快，竖线质量没有昨天的好，就最后一条还行，用了老师昨晚的方法，感觉不是很好操作，呼吸的速度和节奏和起笔节奏是速度不一样，我起笔挺慢的主要是。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":768,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231021/202310210603143059752.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231021/202310210603142902870.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第七天\n写竖又有新进步，那就是笔不要和纸太垂直。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":758,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231020/2023102004165958416634.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231020/2023102004165960625716.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第六天\n横线很舒服，竖线写的有些累，姿势还需要调整，尤其是腿部的姿势。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231019/202310190412206887885.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":768,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231019/2023101904122068179554.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第五天\n写竖终于找到感觉，要点还是不能塌腕，大臂要灵活，不能太用力，哈哈哈，有些感觉只能意会不可言传。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":744,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231018/2023101803035905188261.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231018/2023101803035912154089.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第四天\n竖稍微好一点了，横其中几个写的慢写的还行，一快就不好了，下次慢一点","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":768,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231017/2023101703131746990858.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231017/2023101703131755966105.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第三天\n横线好久不写有退步，竖线后面找到些感觉，就是手腕不能太歪，大臂带动小臂。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":940,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231013/2023101310004524112797.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231013/2023101310025494352431.jpg","idx":0},{"width":508,"height":960,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231013/2023101310004535541080.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第二天\n前头因为桌子宽度不够写的有些麻烦，没法一笔写成，今天搞个木板，终于够用了。哈哈。横的功底还在，竖也要加油练。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":917,"height":640,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231006/2023100610134163572920.jpg","idx":0},{"width":640,"height":925,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20231006/2023100610134165395543.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"竖第一天\n写的有些快，起笔不熟练，行笔两侧不均匀，收笔倒是比横线容易些，继续练习吧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4440,"height":2075,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230930/2023093009314919314011.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横第105天\n不知能否开始练竖了\n","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":2501,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230929/2023092910141012350568.jpg","idx":0},{"width":3072,"height":4440,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230929/2023092910140937630377.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横第104竖第1天\n第一天写竖，桌子纵深不够，必须分段写，很多问题，还没看教学，明天看了以后再练。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3645,"height":2527,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230928/2023092810422652987390.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第103天\n对起笔又有些新的体会，有时候起笔会有一个尖，我发现如果压的太狠而行走不足就容易出现这个问题。如果边向下压边向右走就会好很多。不知大家有没有类似的感觉？","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3754,"height":2207,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230927/2023092709200107474314.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横第102天\n调整了行笔的状态，果然收笔好多了。一个新的体会是起笔不能太松垮，又有一定的按的力量，否则笔和纸无法很好的贴合，摩擦力不够。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":4096,"height":2724,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230926/2023092608251264074567.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横第101天\n几日不写，有些退步，主要是在收笔上做的不好，但归根到底是因为行笔的时候按的重，超过了1/3，之所以按的重，又和起笔的质量密切相关。书法是一个复杂的活动。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2046,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230923/202309230319404763505.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横，第100天\n数字挺吉利，不过起笔突然有些退步，有些收笔也没太做好，练了一周收笔，老师觉得有进步吗，能练竖了？","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1968,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230922/2023092210403633944058.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横第九十九天\n收笔还是不太稳定。\n体会是拉皮筋的时候笔尽量不要倒，不要倾斜太多，起笔的时候往后走的稍微快一些能避免起笔出尖。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230921/2023092103462974296611.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第九十八天\n前几个收笔还是不好，就重新看了收藏的收笔视频，后面就好些了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2046,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230920/2023092003081025895951.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横97天\n收笔的新感悟，收笔有一个过程，并不是在结尾处收而是有个提前准备的过程，提前把笔缓缓弹起，同时不停止行笔，这样才能确保毛笔收拢收尖，否则就是扁的。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230919/2023091903104970192208.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横第九十六天\n起笔成功与否关系到能否拉好皮筋，有时墨太多，会导致头粗而且摩擦力小，不能很好的感受拉的感觉。一根线条写太长，墨变少，线条也会慢慢变细，笔豪失去弹性，收笔就不太好收，也起不到收笔的效果。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2110,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230918/2023091810462131971898.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横九十五\n有时候写得太快，拉皮筋的感觉就消失了，还是慢一点好。行笔压的太重收笔就不好收了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230917/2023091704070138211365.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"横第九十四天\n特别注意收笔动作，有一定进步，温习了老师之前的视频，对行笔的也有了新的感觉。拉皮筋，行笔不用往下压太狠，而是在行笔中保持笔豪的弹性体会笔豪和纸面的摩擦力。每天练习前看一遍视频或许是一个好方法。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1640,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230915/2023091503515675454641.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第九十二天\n准备闯关，不知能否成功","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230914/202309140255418083428.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第九十一天\n@牛老师不知道能否继续练竖？\n行笔后大胆铺豪，线条一般不会差，外加注意控制方向，手腕的放送。不过目前收笔还是有待加强。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1854,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230912/2023091206243036242330.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第九十天\n不知这个水平达到要求没，个人感觉还有些差距。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2016,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230912/2023091207280640755579.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第88天\n写得细，不敢铺豪，不稳","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1808,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230907/2023090710034516465471.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十七天\n收笔还是很难做到圆润啊，各位给支支招吧。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1676,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230906/2023090610264157093488.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十六天\n保持进步，继续加油。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1878,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230905/2023090510172925018840.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十五天\n继续坚持，保持进步","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1334,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230904/2023090410360234260635.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十四日\n起笔稍显不足，但行笔还可以，前两个线稍显别扭，手腕下榻，紧张所致，后面调整过后十分满意。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2100,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230903/2023090310375129412532.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十三天\n做坚持的少数人，保持进步","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1676,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230901/2023090110354604516456.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十二\n自然感受，让笔豪自在行走，收笔时自然弹起，说是回拉，符合自然书写习惯。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2086,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230831/2023083109301564980837.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第八十一天\n用述古的第二天，弹性足，收笔好收，但起笔需要一定的功力。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1279,"height":1706,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230830/2023083005380316598279.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第80天\n中间因为搬家耽误了不少天，从今天开始停止非必要的活动，重新开始打卡","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2114,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230813/2023081302450272832629.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十九天\n早上就写完了，忘记打卡了，今天洇墨有些减轻，整体感觉不错","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2020,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230811/2023081110002959768381.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十八天\n昨天不洇，今天就洇，有点玄学了，受洇墨影响，写得一般。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1996,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230810/2023081009372983985255.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十七天\n继续放松的行笔，但有时还是太用力，虽然写了77天，才刚去入了松的门径，需要努力。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2140,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230809/2023080901462819967215.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十六天\n改了执笔后，行笔非常放松自在，收笔也没有问题，用意不用力地自然而然地留下痕迹。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1936,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230808/20230808125442481503.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十五天\n今天的纸属于一半洇一半不洇，看了群里老师的执笔视频，尝试了一下，确实写得感觉不一样，线条质量比较好，大家猜猜哪些是调整后的。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1916,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230807/2023080710412623250803.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十四天\n换了更好的墨，不在洇墨，毛毡也是干净的，开心。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230806/2023080610093735857598.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十三天\n感觉不错，静下来初步有些感受，关注到杂乱的念头，呼吸等，和打坐是类似的，这是进步的开始。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2054,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230804/2023080410121415740142.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十二天\n被墨搞得有点尴尬，老是洇墨，把毛毡搞得都是黑的，最近状态一般，发现笔毛偏转就重新蘸墨，接着写，老师就是这样做的。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1854,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230803/2023080309240935127542.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十一天\n行笔中偶尔会出现一侧重一侧轻的情况，应该是按的过重和手腕不能及时调整所导致的，以后应该注意。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1878,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230802/2023080207320474471216.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第七十天\n调整粗细的第一天，整体收笔更有力，更圆润，行笔更有张力笔豪保持弹性，建议有相关问题的同学适当调整。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1510,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230801/2023080108212404891262.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十九天\n广州太潮湿，刚写上去不洇，过一会不忍直视。加上墨和毛毡不行，成就了这练习的糊，感觉比生宣都洇😄","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2232,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230731/2023073110015783980566.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十八天\n很久以来，写得都有着太粗了，导致收笔收不回来，今天后半段写得稍微细了些感觉不错。以后应该早些打卡，速度放慢。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1870,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230730/2023073008524023074472.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十七天横\n毛毡不合适，不过线条质量还可以，计划换个毛毡，开始学习金刚功。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1866,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230727/2023072707505177686940.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十六天\n写得相对快了，行笔容易歪，收笔也就不太圆，需要继续努力。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230726/2023072607465640963807.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十五天\n继续坚持，收笔还有待提高。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2046,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230725/2023072507314372056764.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十四天\n傍晚天气凉爽，把桌子搬到外面写，就是有蚊子。起笔慢一点，线条会好些，收笔个别不太满意。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1784,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230724/2023072408302967493292.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十三天\n写字让人心安，而游戏让人心烦。因为一个是和自己和解，一个是与他人对抗，是时候停止玩游戏了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2200,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230723/202307230722112576942.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十二天，间隔了几天继续打卡，功夫还在，收笔好看些了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1770,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230714/202307140837074308864.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十二天\n感觉个别收笔还不错，换了地方，整体都细了不少。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2246,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230713/2023071306131758947890.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十一天\n再次体会到提按的尺度的重要性，按的过重反而更容易造成笔画边缘的毛糙，把手腕提起来，自然的行笔笔画就很饱满。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1276,"height":1302,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230712/2023071206043273841562.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六十天\n第一次打卡到另外一个账号了，每次都在变，好无语。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230711/2023071107011005995468.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十九天\n专注于收笔动作，执笔规范性，再稍慢些。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1730,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230709/2023070907554280644658.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十八天\n换了毛笔，但起笔还不错，线条也比较直，下一步着重解决收笔问题。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1428,"height":1286,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230705/2023070507064395450776.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十五天\n把握笔位置提高，不用弯腰和前倾，手腕不下塌，写得很舒服。有类似问题的可以试一下。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1279,"height":1462,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230704/2023070403562972992563.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十四天\n经过昨天的发现和调整，今天注意手腕的高度，写得很舒服，目前写得最好的一次。还尝试了竖线，发现也不太难，哈哈。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2020,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230703/2023070303350299815880.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十三天
继续和直线斗争，竟然经历了三个阶段。
第一条，虽然刻意调整了，但仍然歪了。
后面几条，努力让笔杆和笔豪在同一条水平线上。差强人意。
最后几条，发现手腕下塌，于是调整姿势，仍然让杆和豪在同一水平线，舒服多了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1346,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230702/2023070206231346415285.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十二天\n比较满意，要想写平，要可以往上才行。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1666,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230701/2023070106595787984562.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230701/2023070106595788215316.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十一天\n好像还是有些偏下，可能和大臂打不开有关，但坚持本身就值得赞叹。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1460,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230630/2023063003380548426408.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第五十次\n昨天的问题找到了原因，只要起笔慢一点就可以顺利解决，继续解决线条不够水平的问题。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1842,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230629/2023062903444063825365.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十九次\n起笔不太好，不少都由于未知原因弹出个尖，后续需要再慢一些。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1382,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230628/2023062803491103235736.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十八次\n笔画末端略显粗糙，但相对以前歪得轻些。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1370,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230627/2023062703084270344218.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十七次\n逐渐加快速度，越写越自在","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1652,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230626/2023062603301862884310.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1772,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230626/2023062603301883435085.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十六天\n九天前从未有过渗墨的困扰，现在不管咋写基本都要渗墨，这就是所谓力透纸背吗？","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1732,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230625/2023062503345247389075.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230625/2023062503345790828537.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230625/2023062503351140095855.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十五天，牙疼总算基本恢复。\n对毛笔的把握已和初始大为不同，对与毛边的出现也不再过分纠结，开启规律打卡模式。附上西北高原雨后景色。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230621/2023062105560672318509.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十五天，夏至日\n牙继续疼，少写两根，感觉整体朝下走。提前祝大家端午安康","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1428,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230620/2023062006001515171762.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十三天\n牙疼，状态一般，不过对笔的掌握在进步。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1294,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230619/2023061905405571474494.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1279,"height":1706,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230619/2023061905451709539736.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十二条\n回到办公室，使用熟悉的毛笔，熟悉的毛毡和砚台，一切都是那么舒服。前几天在家里毛笔，墨，和毛毡都是新的，写的毛毡全是墨。\n由这个经历也发现原来毛毡也会影响书写，乃至纸张是否会往下渗墨，建议买好点的毛毡，推荐用阿里巴巴购买，买纸送的这种毛毡建议扔掉，因为很难和纸张紧密贴合。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2006,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230618/202306180917126984977.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十一天，\n分享一下起笔的心得，以便初学同学快速掌握。\n起笔主要动作是按提按，不少同学忽略了中间的提，这其实很重要。另外就是最后的按，不是用蛮力直接往下按，而是控制一定的力道，在向右缓慢行笔的同时下按。总之掌握起笔贵在慢下来，多练习。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1688,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230617/2023061709031555231015.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四十天\n使用述古第二天，起笔成功率已达90%，整体不错。对为何 会歪有了新的思考，写一段要调整笔倾斜的角度，否则手机偏向一侧就容易歪。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2116,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230616/202306160732428827594.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十九天\n换了述古，相比之前的笔偏硬，蓄墨能力不足，细。换了墨和毛毡，结果渗墨严重，应该是墨的问题。不过整体的行笔还是不错的，目前对提按的体会和乏善可陈的体会是一致的。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1358,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230615/2023061511112200431124.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十八天，\n渐入佳境……\n把起笔更加熟练，把收笔更加实在。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2232,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230614/2023061411331339846845.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"三十七天\n重温站立写横线和心法视频，收获很多。\n对提按有了新的体会。大家遇到瓶颈也可以再去复习复习。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1714,"height":1286,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230612/2023061210510594594921.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230612/2023061210510604650524.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十六次\n个人感觉线条质量还可以，不过目前存在两个主要问题，一是个别起笔太快，粗细不均。二是大多数写的歪，十个里只有两条稍微直一点。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230611/2023061107013260336147.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十五次\n主打一个歪字，分析了原因，主要是人站在中间，从左手边开始起笔不习惯，如果从身体中间起笔就会好很多。各位帮忙看看有没有棱。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1279,"height":1302,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230610/2023061003575433528011.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第三十四次\n状态一般，继续坚持。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2062,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230609/2023060903561698743882.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"癸卯年四月二十二，第三十三次\n几乎每根要五分钟，但写直真的太难了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1784,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230608/2023060804363356493572.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"癸卯年四月二十一，第三十二次。\n整体满意，最后一条特别慢，效果不错。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230607/2023060712351307234629.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"癸卯年四月二十，第三十一次\n后面写的比较细，感觉不错，以后就按这么来写。用卷尺量的大概1.3cm，不过未必准确。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2586,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230606/202306061025228619749.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1736,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230606/2023060610252299731435.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"癸卯年四月十九，第三十次\n一个月了，起笔基本做到了80%能起好，个别有问题，起笔真的太重要了。\n目前存在的问题是起笔的粗细把握不好，有些细，有些粗。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2126,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230605/2023060511575799948031.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"癸卯年四月十八，第二十九次\n更换为三指执笔，仍需适应，横线很容易写歪。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1434,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230604/2023060412170232696319.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2504,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230604/2023060412170229476325.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"癸卯年四月十七，第二十八次
1，这几天手腕在某些角度会疼，不知是打篮球还是写横线姿势不对导致的。
2，在纠结执笔方法，感觉自己用五指执笔法站着写手腕容易紧张，后面几条像老师那样用三指执笔法，手腕好一些。
3，发现大臂也要灵活，不能夹着，有根据行笔处离自己的距离调节","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2176,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230603/2023060311472041358768.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"癸卯年四月十六，第二十七次打卡\n整体感觉可以，相比之前进步不小\n部分线条太粗，部分线条写到最后身体没调整，看着直，其实向上翘了","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":3021,"height":1050,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230602/2023060204030573814809.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1382,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230602/2023060204030590991867.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月十五，第二十六次】\n这次起笔没没有大毛病了，整体也还行。\n有个最新体会就是写着写着手腕容易往下塌，毛笔也跟着下塌，笔画边缘容易不整齐，且对摩擦力的感知力下降，手腕应该更放松才对。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1952,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230601/2023060111594294521720.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"癸卯年四月十四，第二十五次\n儿童节快乐🎉\n起笔仍待加强","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2963,"height":851,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230531/2023053111131174575579.jpg","idx":0},{"width":2412,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230531/2023053111131228322326.jpg","idx":1}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月十三，第二十四次】
今天写的不太好，总结了一些经验教训
1，写字的时候不能听歌，可听传统音乐，最好不听
2，起笔至关重要，关系到行笔是否顺利，笔与纸的摩擦力和一条横线的形态，因此一定要慢下来。
3，行笔过程中手腕不能下塌，否则影响力的传导，尤其是影响摩擦力的感觉，其他身体如眼睛，重心，脖子等部位的状态都对壁画的质量和形态有影响。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1488,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230530/2023053006400416259458.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月十二，第二十三次】\n中间有两个起笔没起好，几乎没有摩擦力，线条虚浮。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1950,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230529/2023052905340088690952.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月十一，第二十二次】 \n继续坚持。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2336,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230528/2023052805083324779858.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月初十，第二十一次】\n状态一般，有几根起笔有问题，大部分行笔越到后面越粗，提按状态掌握不好，唯一的优点就是比较直。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1536,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230527/2023052711474899452573.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月初九，第二十次】\n渐入佳境，起笔仍有问题，有几根粗细不一样","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":863,"height":575,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230526/2023052608533845633495.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1488,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230526/2023052608534673949709.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":2,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月初八，佛诞日，第十九次打卡】\n初步体会到意在笔先的感觉，就是把注意力放在还没书写出来的部分，而不是纠结前头不直或没写好。另外起笔真的太重要了！最后，顶礼皈依本师释迦牟尼佛，愿大家佛诞日吉祥。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2298,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230525/2023052509523753720446.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月初七，第十八天】
对摩擦力又有新的体会：摩擦力是线条质量的保证。
摩擦力在慢的时候会比较大，快的时候比较小；
摩擦力在墨开始的时候会比较大，如果快没墨了就会比较小，这时候就该蘸墨接笔了；
摩擦力在提按适中的情况下比较大，按的重或者提的多的时候比较小。
这个物理学上摩擦力与正压力成正比是不同的。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1764,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230524/2023052409472123622945.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月初六，第十七天】
写好一条直线需要注意哪些要点？
1，起笔要慢一些，把笔豪铺开，避免分叉，偏转。
2，行笔，关注笔尖落到纸面的长度，确保用三分之一笔头行笔，关注到笔杆的角度，执笔的方式，全身是否放松，关注直线是否笔直。
3，收笔，收笔不能着急，关注笔尖的收拢。
可见写好直线是个复杂工程，尤其是在行笔的时候，需要关注这么多东西应该怎么练呢，方法就是各个击破，每一个阶段只关注其中一点，比如","hasMore":true}

{"images":[{"width":1794,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230523/2023052309353187652795.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【癸卯年四月初五，第十六天】\n发现个事，起笔如果太快，笔和纸接触不够，行笔就会失去纸和笔的摩擦显得线条很虚浮，如果稍微等一等，笔和纸就会有充分接触。线条质感就会好一些。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230522/202305220324167176026.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第十五天】癸卯年四月初四\n今天写的比较多\n看了一遍视频，改了执笔方式，行笔是毛笔笔毛不是很顺，收笔操之过急，仍需努力！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2345,"height":1280,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230521/2023052106230827611468.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230521/2023052106230815952626.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230521/2023052106230827678265.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"【第十四日】癸卯年四月初三日
换了个毛笔，才发现原来的毛笔确实不行。
请教大家在写的时候手腕的状态，是图二还是图三，其中图二手腕是立起来的，图三是平的。个人感觉图三更舒服，站得直，也更灵活，老师如果看到了也麻烦解答一下。
后面两根是用图三写的，身体很舒服。站直就可以了，图二要把腰弯下去，很累。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2314,"height":1278,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230520/2023052009303036364016.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"遇到瓶颈，每次写完不能很好的收笔，笔锋散，书写下一根前要很麻烦的在墨池里蘸墨，以便能把毛笔搞成圆锥形状，不知道这样对不对！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230519/2023051903134180632837.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230519/2023051903134185716227.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230519/2023051903134192338716.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"1，起笔不能快，要和行笔一样慢，之前有点快了。
2，行笔由于用的纸比较差，习惯写的快，因为怕洇墨，要改正。
3，长横一般一次写不完，如果强行写完就会导致笔迹干了以后泛白，不好看。这次后面几个都是两笔写的。
4，行笔毛糙还是偶尔出现，收笔还有待学习提高。
5，控笔能力确实在提升，试着写了两个字，勉强能看了。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230518/2023051806062950955162.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230518/2023051806062954854538.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1702,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230518/2023051806062955849406.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第十一天，前两根墨有些少，总体来说有较大进步，不过收笔还不圆，收笔要领没完全掌握。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2534,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230517/2023051710584315133329.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"起笔收笔有一定进步，行笔有些躁。最后一笔写的还行，前面不自觉往下歪。继续加油鸭！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2194,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230516/2023051609452388941198.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"如何避免毛糙的线条，起笔至关重要，一定要把笔锋铺开，没有分叉，没有旋转，没有一高一低。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":2408,"height":1282,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230515/2023051506582376596755.jpg","idx":0},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230515/2023051506582299751170.jpg","idx":1},{"width":1280,"height":1707,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230515/2023051506582312759001.jpg","idx":2}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":3,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天又看了起笔的视频，按，提，按，之前忽略了提，导致毛笔被压的太重，如前6个。写完以后毛笔无法聚拢，收笔有很大问题。后面调整以后明显好得多，大家每次写之前可以多看视频。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1772,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230514/2023051401045629882578.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"粗细不够均匀，笔容易歪，缴在一起。另外发现笔在写了一次之后会形成一个特定的方向，沿着这个方向笔毛才能理顺。写的时候身体发热，应该是好现象。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1558,"height":1276,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230513/2023051306584407178206.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第六天，笔画写的更细，发现自己在前面能保持中锋，后面就变侧锋了，收笔上面短一截，后期写的时候要注意。","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1548,"height":1284,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230512/202305120947528034581.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"今天发现之前写的太粗，不但线条粗糙，更是难以收笔，这次后面尽可能写的细了，线条质感好了一些，又是进步的一天！","hasMore":false}

{"images":[{"width":1279,"height":1706,"src":"https://cc.hjfile.cn/cc/img/20230511/2023051105322179215911.jpg","idx":0}],"audios":[],"imageTotalCount":1,"audioTotalCount":0,"text":"第四天，换个号，继续练。换了个毛笔，感觉还行，慢，静。","hasMore":false}
